title: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a pool by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a swimming pool has many interpretations, including positive and negative, which puts the dreamer in a state of confusion and the constant question is whether this vision indicates the appearance of good things or is there another meaning behind it, and this we will explain through this article in the following lines, so that the heart of the dreamer is reassured. He does not get distracted by many, many different interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in the pool: If the dreamer sees himself swimming in the pool with many people in his dream, this is a sign that he will enter into a partnership with many righteous people who will achieve many great successes with each other. Which will return to their lives. He lives with a lot of money and profits. Watching in a dream the dreamer swims himself in the pool with many people he knows, this indicates the strength of the bond that unites them and their intense love for each other. If a man watches himself in a state of extreme fear swimming with people he does not know While he is sleeping, this indicates that he has great fears that anything unwanted will happen in the future. Seeing the same person swimming in a large swimming pool during his dream means that he will receive a lot of good and happy news that will make his heart very happy. When the dreamer sees that the swimming pool If the person swimming in it is very clean in a dream, this means that the date of his marriage to a beautiful girl who has many good qualities and morals that will make him feel joyful and happy in his life is approaching. With her.Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a pool by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin said that seeing a person swimming in a pool with many unknown people in a dream indicates that he is on the verge of a difficult period in his life during which he will go through many financial crises that will have an impact on his life. life. God is Most High and Most Knowing. Seeing himself swimming in a swimming pool with a high degree of cleanliness in his dream is a sign that God will make his life full of comfort and tranquility, and for this reason he can focus on his life, whether personal or professional. If a man sees himself swimming in the swimming pool during his sleep, then this It means that the date of his marriage to a beautiful girl with a high degree of faith is approaching, and they will achieve many great successes and achievements related to life with each other. Either personally. Practice. When a person sees himself swimming in a large, clean swimming pool during his sleep, this is evidence that he will have an excellent position in society, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about swimming in a pool for a single woman: If a girl sees herself swimming in a pool with many people whom she will not meet in her dream, This is evidence that she is associated with a bad personality and will spend difficult and tiring days with him. With him, she will feel a great failure in her life. When a girl sees herself swimming in a pool of dark and impure water in a dream, this means that she will feel a failure and extreme despair due to her inability to achieve any goal or ambition in her life in the coming periods. If the dreamer sees herself swimming in a pool Clear and clean water in a dream, this is a sign of

title: Interpretation of bombing in a dream for a married woman

preview.html: Interpretation of bombing in a dream for a married woman. Interpretation of a dream about bombing has many interpretations, and among these interpretations are the following: When a married woman sees bombing in a dream, this is a sign that her pregnancy is approaching, and God knows best. Seeing bombings in a dream for a married woman indicates the intensity of her fear and she may be disturbed and tense, as well as she An indication of the lies of some of the things that were said about her and her home. When a married woman sees launching missiles in a dream, this indicates salvation and victory over some of the problems she faces, and it is also a sign of overcoming adversity and difficulties. If a married woman sees missiles launching in her dream, this It indicates the goodness and blessing that she will find. When a married woman sees a rocket burning, this indicates that she is suffering from an illness. If she sees that the war is continuing and rockets are being launched, this is a sign that there are many problems in her life, as they are becoming more complicated and not being resolved. When a married woman sees a rocket being launched, this indicates her imminent journey at the command of God. If a married woman sees herself riding a rocket, this indicates her success at different levels in her work and life in general. When a married woman sees a burning rocket, this indicates that she will face crises. In her life. When a married woman sees a missile in her home in a dream, this indicates that goodness will soon come to her and her family by God’s command. Interpretation of a dream of bombing in a dream for a single woman. Interpretations differed about a dream of bombing for a single woman and came as follows: When an unmarried girl sees bombing in In a dream, being bombed by planes or bombs, this means that she will marry a man who has great courage. When an unmarried woman sees many bombs, this indicates the seriousness of her fear and her exposure to many problems that lead her to failure. When an unmarried woman sees herself in a dream as if she is in a war There were shells coming from every direction, and she emerged victorious from the war. This indicates the wealth that she will gain. When an unmarried woman sees a missile bombing in a dream and she survived this bombing and was victorious, this is a sign that she will hear good and happy news soon, by God’s will. If a woman sees An unmarried woman sees many missiles, this indicates that she will get married or engaged soon. If an unmarried woman sees herself in a war and does not participate in it, this is a sign that she is going through many psychological crises. When an unmarried woman sees a missile falling in her house, this indicates the spread of corruption in her family. She must draw closer to God Almighty. This vision is not hopeful at all. Interpretation of a dream about bombing in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing bombing in a dream for a pregnant woman has many indicators, which can be seen as follows: When a pregnant woman sees shells in a dream, this means that the date of birth is approaching and that her condition is stable and not There are problems. When a pregnant woman sees herself fighting with a sword in her dream, this means that she will go through the labor process well and safely and it will be practical and not

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing driving a car in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a car driving in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about seeing a car driving in a dream, the meaning of driving a car in a dream for a married woman and a pregnant woman, seeing a white car driving, the consequences of driving a car without lights, interpretation of driving a fast car, the symbol of driving a car for transportation, driving a car in a dream is A dream of many people. Some see driving a black car or driving an old car, others see an accident occurring while driving a car in a dream and do not know what is good and what is bad in this vision, so we will explain correctly through the interpretation of the driving vision. A car in a dream according to what is stated in dream books. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car in a dream: The interpretation of seeing yourself driving a car in a dream is evidence of high self-confidence, strength of character, wisdom, and the ability to make the right decisions. Dreaming of driving a large, luxurious car in a dream indicates achieving God's desires, aspirations, and success in what the pioneer seeks. Seeing driving easily in a dream is evidence that the dreamer has psychological balance, calm, and willpower. But if driving a car with difficulty in a dream indicates this, then he will face many difficulties and obstacles in the life of the visionary. Seeing a car that smokes in it A car while driving in a dream is a sign of many problems and conflicts within the family. Seeing a car breaking down while driving in a dream means failing to achieve something and feeling hopeless and frustrated. Interpretation of the vision of driving a car for a single woman: The interpretation of a dream about driving in a dream for a single woman is evidence of She is an independent girl who seeks to achieve herself without thinking about marriage. Seeing someone driving a car in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of her relationship and marriage, and she is close to a person who has wisdom, logic, and intelligence. If you dream that you are driving a car and it crashes in the dream of an engaged woman, this indicates Many problems and disagreements that may delay her marriage. To see yourself riding in the back seat in a dream for a single woman means that things have changed and changed completely. Driving very fast in a dream for a single woman is an indication that she is making decisive decisions quickly in her life. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car For a married woman: The interpretation of seeing and being afraid of driving a car in a dream for a married woman is evidence that she feels anxious and stressed about her ongoing marriage. The fear of driving in a dream for a married woman can also be interpreted as a fear for her children and their future. Seeing a car driving without brakes in a married woman’s dream means that she does not She can control things around her. A dream of driving a red car in a married woman’s dream indicates that she lives with love, happiness, and attention from her husband. Seeing a husband driving a car in a dream for a married woman is evidence that her husband is struggling and working hard at his job so that he can achieve what he desires. Interpretation of a dream about driving a car for a pregnant woman: Seeing a car driving easily and without fear during pregnancy indicates that she will give birth easily and quickly.

title: Interpretation of seeing a married sister in a dream

preview.html: It says differently about women and men in a dream, so what are the indicators of the vision, so we will explain more interpretations from your website gptafser.com/, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing a sister in a dream for a single girlIf an unmarried girl met her sister in a dream and was happy to meet , the vision indicates that the unmarried girl will be engaged. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is in a dream about her sister’s wedding. The vision shows that the dreamer and her husband will get engaged as soon as possible. If an unmarried girl meets her sister in a dream while she is pregnant with a male child, then the vision indicates that The girl will be exposed to a major crisis. But if she sees her sister giving birth to a baby girl in a dream, this indicates saving money for the dreamer. If an unmarried girl meets her older sister in a dream and she hugs her warmly. The vision means that the girl will live in comfort, peace, and love from the family environment. If she dreams If a girl borrows a book from her sister in a dream, the vision means that the girl takes her older sister as an example. It also says that she is distinguished by common sense and a balanced mind more than her sister. If an unmarried woman dreams that her sister is sick in a dream, the vision indicates that she is short with her sister. It also means that her sister is thinking about her and wants to improve her relationship with her. Seeing her sister in a dream and hitting her in the vision means that the girl does not trust herself and her personality is wavering. The vision means that the dreamer will be exposed to many conflicts in the coming days. But if her sister gives birth to a boy, this means goodness and comfort for her and her family. Seeing a married sister marrying her husband It indicates goodness and blessings for the dreamer. If an unmarried girl sees her sister visiting her in a dream or they exchange visits together. The vision shows that she is a healthy girl who strengthens the family relationship between them and loves her very much. A married woman’s quarrel with her sister in a dream means difficulties in life. It also indicates comfort. From anxiety and overcoming all crises with the help of the family. A married woman meets her sister in a dream and reconciles with her after a dispute between them. The vision symbolizes peace of mind for the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing a sister in a dream about a man and its meaning. Meeting a sister in a dream with a man is a praiseworthy dream and indicates lasting joy for the dreamer. The vision also means good luck and prosperity in the dreamer’s life. A man meeting his sister in a dream during her marriage indicates the fulfillment of a long-awaited dream. A man meets his sister in a dream and she gives birth to a baby girl, the vision indicates the end of the visionary’s troubles and sorrows. title: Interpretation of seeing the death of a drowned person in a dream

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing yourself drowning in water and dying in a dream? A sign of committing many sins and transgressions. Seeing a brother drowning, crying and screaming loudly? An indication that the dreamer is experiencing anxiety and distress. What is the interpretation of seeing drowning and dying in the river? The necessity of the monarch correcting the mistakes he made In it. What is the purpose of watching the mother drown in the sea and die? An indication of the dreamer’s need for help and support. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead grandfather drowning in a dream? A sign that the dreamer will be exposed to great financial difficulties. What is the purpose of seeing drowning in the pond and dying? The death of someone close to The dreamer. What is the interpretation of seeing a dead grandfather drowning in a dream? A sign that the dreamer is facing great financial difficulties. Interpretation of seeing the death of a drowning person in a dream. Seeing the dreamer drowning in water and dying in a dream is a sign of committing many sins and disobedience. When he sees the patient dying of suffocation in the dream, it is an indication of the approaching His guardianship and meeting with the Almighty Lord. If you see the whole country drowning and dying in the dream, this is evidence of the spread of injustice and corruption in that city. While seeing drowning at the bottom of the sea symbolizes death, it is a sign of what the dreamer will suffer from the punishment of the ruler. If he sees death In the winter of drowning, this is evidence of the dreamer’s injustice to people and stripping them of their rights, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a brother drowning If the dreamer sees that his brother has drowned in a dream, this is a sign that the brother will be exposed to many problems and financial crises. Seeing a brother drowning while crying and screaming loudly in the dream The dreamer is exposed to distress and distress. While seeing a brother drowning and dying in a dream symbolizes many problems and disputes that will arise within the family. Ibn Sirin believes that seeing a brother drowning in a dream is a sign that this brother will face many consequences and difficulties. This vision in a dream may also indicate The dreamer, then the dreamer is taking the wrong path, and God is All-Knowing of the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about someone drowning in a river. If the dreamer sees that he drowned in the river in the dream, this indicates that he will do a lot of injustice. While it symbolizes the vision of drowning and dying in the river in the dream, the dreamer must correct the mistakes. Which he committed. When the sleeper sees that he drowned in the river in the dream and was sick, this is a sign of the approaching time of his meeting with his Lord. Whoever sees in a dream that he is drowning in the river, but lives in the dream, it is evidence of his extreme religiosity and the strength of his faith in God. Ibn Sirin pointed out that The vision of escaping from drowning in the river is a sign of the end of distress and the collapse of worries and sorrows. Interpretation of a dream of a mother dying from drowning in the sea. If the dreamer sees the mother dying by drowning in the sea, this is a sign that the dreamer will participate in some problems and quarrels. Seeing that the mother drowned in the sea and died indicates the dreamer’s need. To help and support his mother during this period. When the sleeper sees that his mother drowned in the sea during his sleep, this is a sign that the dreamer is overwhelmed with whims and desires. This vision in a dream may also indicate that the mother has accumulated many debts that she cannot repay. If the dreamer sees That his mother drowned in the sea in A

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a watch in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a clock in a dream, a machine whose function is to measure time so that people recognize time and the evolution of the shape and construction of the clock with the development of different eras. In the beginning there was – called an hourglass. As for seeing a clock in a dream, it certainly indicates many different indicators, Which we will learn about in detail in our article today, the interpretation of seeing a clock in a dream according to leading interpreters and scholars. Interpretation of the dream of a clock by Ibn Sirin: Seeing a wall clock indicates the dangers of enemies and adversaries. The sound of the clock ticking in a dream indicates that I hear bad news about myself. As for Looking at a wristwatch a lot, this indicates that he feels hopeless and depressed. Seeing a time clock in a dream means getting money for myself. Interpretation of a dream for a single woman: Seeing single people watching a clock in a dream indicates that the time of marriage is approaching. Seeing an engraved gold watch It indicates marriage to a wealthy man. Seeing a watch made of silver indicates membership or participation. Seeing a watch parked on a woman indicates that her marriage will not take place before she turns thirty. Interpretation of a dream about a watch for a married woman: Seeing the watch being removed from the wall in a married woman’s dream It indicates the disappearance of problems and anxiety in her life. Seeing a watch being removed from her hand in a dream means a warning of problems and problems. Interpretation of a dream about a watch for a pregnant woman: Seeing a pregnant woman watching a watch in a dream indicates that she will have a baby girl. Seeing a gold watch in a dream for a woman The pregnant woman promises her goodness and blessings in her life. Interpretation of a dream about buying a watch: Seeing buying a watch in a dream indicates a positive change in the dreamer’s life. Seeing buying a gold watch in a dream indicates a great desire for the dreamer. Seeing buying a silver watch indicates good status and religion. Seeing buying A cheap watch indicates a deterioration in the dreamer’s condition. Interpretation of a dream about a golden watch: Seeing a golden watch in a dream also symbolizes the dreamer’s good luck. Seeing a golden watch in a dream is a symbol of success and superiority. Seeing a dead person wearing a gold watch indicates the seriousness of the dead person’s condition.

title: Know the interpretation of the dream of shopping by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about shopping in a dream is one of the visions whose interpretation varies from one person to another, depending on the social situation in which the viewer sees the market, whether he is a man or a woman. Seeing shopping in a dream symbolizes good or bad news that the dreamer will be exposed to in the future, and we will tell you about it in detail in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about shopping: Going shopping in a dream means that the dreamer knows his goals, money, and what he owes to this world. To see shopping in an unknown place means loss. But walking in the market depends on the types of goods you buy. If it is a basic need, then it is good for the dreamer and vice versa. If you see that you are walking in the market and there are people in the dream, then this is good, a blessing, and an abundant supply. Interpretation of a dead man running in the market in a dream It means that he needs alms and prayers to alleviate his suffering. Shopping in a dream indicates a wide world and a great imbalance in society in general, so you need to be careful when you see the market. Also, seeing a man shopping in a dream may mean that he does not go to Friday prayers in the mosque. Interpretation of a dream about shopping by Ibn Sirin: Shopping in a dream suggests that the dreamer is characterized by humility and good worship. Interpretation of a dream about shopping and buying new clothes can indicate promotion and gaining a prominent position at work. In the case of buying from the perfume market in a dream, this is evidence of an attractive appearance and interest in beauty. But if The dreamer saw that he was robbed while shopping, this is evidence that he does not pay attention to prayer and commits many sins. The dream interpretation website on the Internet is a site specialized in interpreting dreams in the Arab world, just write. Dream interpretation website on the Internet. Search for it on Google and get the correct interpretations. Interpretation Dreams about individual shopping: Seeing shopping in a dream for unmarried women portends a lot of goodness and the fulfillment of her desired dreams. However, if an unmarried woman sees that she is shopping in the perfume market, this indicates that her husband is handsome in appearance and has good morals. Seeing unmarried women shopping in the fruit market can be a sign That they are about to get married. While dreaming of shopping in the mall for single women in a dream may indicate that this girl will enter a changing phase in her life. Interpretation of a dream about shopping with a single woman: Seeing shopping with a lover in a dream for a single woman indicates the strong love relationship that she has with her lover and her love. Sincere to him. Perhaps a dream about shopping with a lover indicates that you will soon marry someone you love. If an unmarried woman saw that she was shopping with her lover in a dream, this indicates the nobility of her morals and good nature, and it may also indicate the common things that bring them together. The vision may be a sign of Abundance of livelihood and its blessings with money, and God knows best. The vision also indicates that the girl has many good friends who help her on the right path. Interpretation of a dream in a mall for single women. Interpretation of a dream in a mall for a single woman. If she buys herself new clothes, this is a sign that this girl will enter

title: The 20 most important interpretations of a dream about my husband holding a woman’s hand, according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about my husband holding a woman’s hand can have many meanings for the dreamer depending on the situation he sees in his dream. There are those who dream that their husband is holding the hand of another woman and walking with her, and there are those who see their husband proposing to another woman, or embracing her, or shaking her hand, or marrying her, and among other possible dreams. Interpretation of a dream about my husband holding a woman’s hand. Interpretation of a dream that my husband is holding another woman’s hand It may indicate how jealous a woman is of her husband and her fear that he will meet another woman, and here she may need to pray a lot to God so that he can be reassured about her. Calms her mind. A dream of my husband holding the hand of another woman next to me, for a woman suffering from sadness and anxiety, may indicate close comfort from God, the Blessed and Almighty. My husband sleeping with another woman next to me could symbolize the happiness that both spouses can experience, provided that Understanding and caring for affection and mercy, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. A woman may dream that her husband is looking at another woman in a dream and this may remind her of the strength of her relationship with her husband and that she must work hard to get rid of the differences and judgments that exist between them. Interpretation of dreams of my husband holding the woman’s hand by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin believes Seeing a husband with another woman in a dream could be evidence of some of the feelings that the dreamer is feeling. Regarding the dream of my husband interacting with a woman in a different way, it may remind the dreamer how much she loves her husband, and that she must work to create a stable and happy home. Pay attention and work hard to avoid loss as much as possible, and of course it is necessary to rely on God Almighty. Interpretation of a dream about my husband holding the hand of a pregnant woman: A dream about my husband holding the hand of another pregnant woman next to me may be a sign for her that the vagina is close to God Almighty, and therefore she must stop worrying and excessive stress. You should also get closer to God Almighty and many more. A prayer for him to calm the situation as quickly as possible, and sometimes the interpretation of a dream about my husband holding a woman’s hand may be nothing more than a mere reflection of what is on the dreamer’s mind: his fear of his wife and his jealousy of him. Sometimes a dream about my husband with another woman is evidence of how much the dreamer loves her husband and that their relationship together is very good and they must stay together and get rid of the problems that bother them in their days. The husband’s dream that he loves another woman I know and runs away with her, because it may symbolize the husband’s corrupt practices. His good and bad qualities that he must try to change before it is too late, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about my husband holding the hand of a strange woman. Interpretation of a dream about my husband holding the hand of a strange woman could indicate feelings of jealousy that control the viewer and make him think about many things, and here he can try to get rid of negative thoughts. And focusing on his married life more than before. Interpretation of a dream about my husband holding the hand of my predecessor. A dream about my husband cheating on me with my predecessor may be a reflection of jealousy in this woman’s heart towards the dreamer. Here the dreamer is advised to pray to God a lot to prevent hatred and malice between her and others. You may also need to talk to Her predecessor to solve this matter, and God Almighty knows best
